extensionDescription.message: This add-on is being discontinued because Thunderbird natively supports this feature.

discontinue-text.message: It's been a while since Thunderbird offered native support for CalDAV and CardDAV. One reason this add-on has still been usefull was its ability to discover iCloud resources. I have directly contributed this feature and Thunderbird 128 is now able to nativly discover iCloud resources.

replacement-text.message: I would like to thank you for your support in the last years. After Thunderbird itself has now gained most of the core functionality of this add-on, it is time to say good bye. Thunderbird will continue to sync all your currently configured CalDAV calendars and CardDAV address books. If this was the only used provider for TbSync, you may uninstall TbSync as well.
